Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供衍生自這個類別之所有驗證控制項的核心實作。

span.span: Provides the core implementation for all validation controls derived from this class.

summary.span: 無法具現化抽象類別。

span.span: As an abstract class, it cannot be instantiated.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自基底類別，因此會有屬性。The class inherits from the base class, and thus has a property. 發生無效的項目，驗證程式顯示的值屬性。In the event of an invalid entry, the validator displays the value of the property. 如果未設定的屬性，驗證程式就會顯示的值屬性; 這是文字，如下所示控制項。If the property is not set, the validator displays the value of the property instead; this is the text that is shown in the control. 這是與 Web Form 驗證一致。This behavior is consistent with Web Forms validators. 在這些支援驗證是 ASP.NET 行動控制項控制項 (其屬性) 和控制項 (其屬性)。Of the ASP.NET mobile controls, those that support validation are the control (its property) and the control (its property). 其他控制項可以參與驗證包括屬性。Other controls can participate in validation by including a attribute. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 驗證針對特定值 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7)文件。For more information, see the [How to: Validate Against a Specific Value for ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3db6f7e6-ad52-42cf-a429-c2aaa7d64ed7) documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性僅支援值。The property supports only the value. .NET Framework Web Form列舉，代表在驗證控制項中的錯誤訊息的不同的顯示行為。The .NET Framework Web Forms enumeration represents the different display behaviors of the error messages in validation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性使用兩種方式。This property is used in two ways. 首先，如果沒有任何值，如屬性、 值屬性用在其位置。First, if there is no value for the property, the value of the property is used in its place. 第二個，當控制項時，摘要會使用值表示無效的控制每個驗證程式的屬性。Second, when the control is used, the summary uses the value of the property for each validator that represents an invalid control.
